#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	int n,k; cin>>n>>k;
	string a; cin>>a;
	int ca=0,cb=0,cc=0,tot=0;
	for(int i=0; i<k; i++){
		tot=0, ca=0, cb=0, cc=0;
		for(int j=i; j<n; j+=k){
			if(a[j]=='a') ca++;
			else if(a[j]=='b') cb++;
			else cc++;
			tot++;
		}
		int va=tot-ca, vb=tot-cb, vc=tot-cc;
		vector<pair<int,int> >v;
		v.push_back(make_pair(va,'a'));
		v.push_back(make_pair(vb,'b'));
		v.push_back(make_pair(vc,'c'));
		sort(v.begin(),v.end());
		int x=v[0].second;
		char y=x;
		cout<<y;
	}
}
